original_text: And he said to him, “Say now to her, ‘See, you have taken all this trouble for us; what is to be done for you? Would you have a word spoken on your behalf to the king or to the commander of the army?’” She answered, “I dwell among my own people.”
korean_text: 엘리사가 자기 사환에게 이르되 너는 그에게 이르라 네가 이같이 우리를 위하여 세심한 배려를 하는도다 내가 너를 위하여 무엇을 하랴 왕에게나 사령관에게 무슨 구할 것이 있느냐 하니 여인이 이르되 나는 내 백성 중에 거주하나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: See, you have taken all this trouble for us;
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 당신은 우리를 위해 이 모든 수고를 했구나;

sentences.original_text: what is to be done for you?
Would you have a word spoken on your behalf
to the king or to the commander of the army?'
I dwell among my own people.
